response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique features and unparalleled quality. Given its significance, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. We believe this represents a fantastic deal, considering its worth to you is estimated at $1,000,000. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
